attributes.action: Ensure the Sue Gray report is fully published with no redactions
attributes.additional_details: Public trust in this government is rapidly decaying. Continuing to cover up and deviate from the truth on this matter will have long lasting consequences for trust in our institutions. It's parliament's and the government's responsibility to ensure the public can have full trust in our public institutions.
attributes.background: Ensure the Sue Gray report is fully published with no redactions. The government should not wait to publish the report as it is now ready to be published. The government has promised this report would be delivered and fully published.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606960
